q: As for honoring a convicted felon, Dwaine Caraway said,`` I care deeply about animals'' and`` am deeply sorry to offend anyone who loves animals.'' He acknowledged Michael Vick 's past but noted that since making some bad choices, Michael Vick has devoted time to speaking to children about staying in school staying away from drugs, making positive choices about picking friends and the importance of education. That was the focus of the event. Mayor Tom Leppert said he has asked the city manager to`` propose guidelines to prevent this situation in the future. Defense Donald Rumsfeld Robert Gates will soon lift the ban on initiating new cases against Guantanamo detainees in preparation to increase the use of military commissions for prosecution. Imposed on the day of Barack Obama 's inauguration, the overturned ban will be accompanied by`` an executive order to create a parole board-like system'' to review cases of nearly 50 detainees who would be held without trial. other unions backed it as encouraging investment. The bitter campaign split Italy's powerful labor unions. Sergio Marchionne praised the`` courage'' of workers who gave their approval. Saying yes to flexibility makes it possible to achieve very high production levels, of up to 280,000 vehicles per year, and also open the way for the potential creation of jobs, Sergio Marchionne said in a statement.`` In a country such as Italy, which has always been tied to the past and reluctant to change... those who voted yes showed vision,'' he said.
